ygData.subject: Re: List activity? Let get it going.
ygData.msgSnippet: Damn, how can 10 Charisma be a waster.. I have the Order of Thunder and the Medal of Merit (give you five Charisma) and I get things cheaper.. might not be
ygData.messageBody:
Damn, how can 10 Charisma be a waster.. I have the Order of Thunder and the
Medal of Merit (give you five Charisma) and I get things cheaper.. might not be
alot but it does save you money, oh and you also get more when you sell stuff

Trilin
Everworld

Vince Montana wrote:

> From: "Vince Montana" <montana@...>
>
> i have used it and have not found any differences in selling or buying, i
> have never heard from anyone about this making a difference
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Shawn A. Chesak <baalzebub@...>
> To: <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 2:22 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] List activity? Let get it going.
>
> > From: "Shawn A. Chesak" <baalzebub@...>
> >
> > You call plus 10 charisma a WASTE????
> >
> > combine that with my amulet and tunic and get a +20 charisma..you know
> what
> > kind of price savings you can get with that????? Or how much your own
> wares
> > will sell to NPC's for???
> >
> > You don't have to use it as a weapon, for gods sake. I don't use the
> amulet
> > or tunic except when buying and selling either. man....you get one of
> those
> > staves, just pass it along to me...seeing as you don't think they are
> worth
> > having around. =)
> >
> > L8R,
> >
> > Thadius of Qeynos
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Vince Montana [mailto:montana@...]
> > > Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 8:09 AM
> > > To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com

> > >
> > > the staff sucks, dont waste your time, its like 5/33 and adds 10 to
> > > charisma. its really a waste
> > >
> > > Danek HealFast
> > > Leader of the BlackMoon
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: Scott Pflanzer <pflanzer@...>
> > > To: <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>

> > > >
> > > > I read this list and have a quest question? :)
> > > >
> > > > I am working on the lost book quest -- this one is going ok right now
> > > >
> > > > but the quest that I am having a hard time with is the peacekeeper
> staff
> > > > quest
> > > > the question I have is can a Magi use the Peacekeeper Staff?
> > > > if this staff is not usable by the Magi Classes then I will abandon
> the
> > > > quest due to the fact that I have not found one of the items needed to
> > > > complete the quest.
> > > >
> > > > Mushin wrote:
> > > >

> let
